// Pivot 0, 0
int Flipper4[14] = {
	58, 8,
	54, 1,
	30, 2,
	2, 5,
	1, 8,
	32, 14,
	49, 15
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float Flipper4[14] = {
	1.000000f, 0.500000f,
	0.931035f, 0.062500f,
	0.517241f, 0.125000f,
	0.034483f, 0.312500f,
	0.017241f, 0.500000f,
	0.551724f, 0.875000f,
	0.844828f, 0.937500f
};
